comments.comment: The evolution of Pewd going from Bro to Dad is insane
From a bro to a father, Pewds has come in a long way!
Björn is so adorable. He's such a happy lil mans. I'm so happy for you and Marzia, you deserve every happiness

It’s so comforting for everyone to see Felix and Marzia get their happily ever after, because so so often people don’t get to be as lucky. But maybe just once, we get to witness it this time. It’s just the beginning ️

Seeing Felix & Marzia as adults is the serotonin that 14 year old me never knew I’d need as an adult. These videos count as my anti depressant. It’s so calming to see you just enjoying life. It reminds me how precious every moment really can be. You’ve become a role model for so many of your OG viewers, being an amazing father and husband. You really should be proud
Björn is so adorable.
I never thought I’d be watching this guy go from playing games to doing family/life vlogs, and I’m here for it. Very wholesome indeed.
To know this community is just that good that they feel safe to share their son with us. It makes me cry.
Dude. He's living the life he was destined for. Amazing family, a peaceful life.

I can’t get enough of how much a happy child bjorn is.  You can really tell that he is well loved and having the bestest time just by looking at how cheerful his smiles are. Well done Marzia and Felix!
Omg Björn is so happy in every frame he is in. His face makes all of us glad he has such parents
Him saying ‘so strong’ to Bjorn then immediately cuts to him working out. LOLLL love this family
I really feel so good when you guys get so happy whenever björn does a little movement or try to talk it so wholesome i guess this is what being a parent is .
I just watched this whole video smiling. Watching pewds for years has been such a wholesome journey.
it’s heartwarming to see pewds thriving. really brings me hope to everything. gotta love the man.

I can't believe I am still here to witness Felix & Marzia build a wonderful family. I hope one day I can reach this happiness before then please continue making videos like this it really is a breathe of fresh air
You calling Marzia “mommy” just melts my heart ️ watched you two grow as a couple over all these years and you look so happy and at peace with your little life, congratulations Felix

Please don’t stop making these! They’re helping me through stressful times and keeping me motivated to get to where I wanna be someday. You always have been and will continue to be an inspiration to many, Felix.
I'm a little jealous, not even of his money but his set of mind, his growth. He's great. He deserves everything

Pewds and Marzia look so happy. I remember seeing how stressed Pewds was a few years back fighting the mainstream media constantly. God bless Pewds. You were a part of my childhood and I'm so happy that you're happy
